name: Tasty Tortellinis
author: Nancy R.
summary: Serve these marinated tortellinis as an appetizer with party toothpicks. Can also be used for a nice pasta salad lunch in larger size servings ...Optional ingredients: celery chunks, snow peas, artichoke hearts, salami or cheese chunks, green, yellow, or red pepper chunks, thin carrot slices, pearl onions (use your imagination!). Garnish with fresh parsley, if desired.
directions: Cook tortellini according to package directions--al dente
While tortellini is cooking, prepare marinade
Combine vinegar, mustard, garlic, basil, chopped parsley, onions, and salt and pepper to taste
Drain tortellini and rinse in cold water
Pour marinade over tortellini, add olives (and optional ingredients, see above) and refrigerate
When ready to serve, add Parmesan and some fresh parsley for garnish, if desired
